1373: Mabelie was born in Appel Marckt in 1373.
1379: Lost mother at the age of 6 in childbirth.
Voghel took care of Mabelie since Mabelie was 7.
1380: Left Appel Marckt.A.2 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 8.
1390: Got married to Lucas at age 18 in 1390.
Was taken out of orphanage at age 18.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
Mabelie moved to St. Ians straet.A.2 after marriage.
Became caretaker of Vreile at age 18.
Moved in with husband Lucas's family after marriage.
1391: Gave birth to Ghoudekinen in 1391 at age 18.
Lost sibling Heylewigis in 1391 when Heylewigis was 13.
1392: Gave birth to Sibrando in 1392 at age 19.
1393: Gave birth to Siwa in 1393 at age 20.
1394: Gave birth to Cats in 1394 at age 21.
1397: Gave birth to Tielekine in 1397 at age 24.
1398: Lost daughter Ghela when Ghela was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Ghela in 1398 at age 25.
1399: Gave birth to Ghoudekinen in 1399 at age 26.
